sentences: Tehas toodab iga aastaga üha rohkem autosid.
Sinna on rohkem kui kümme kilomeetrit.
context: Rohkem is the comparative form of 'palju' (much/many) in Estonian. It functions as an adverb meaning 'more' and indicates a greater quantity, degree, or amount compared to something else. It can be used with nouns, verbs, and other parts of speech to express increased amounts or intensities.
